snippet: The trainer Doug O’Neill, who trained the 2012 Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner I’ll Have Another, was suspended 45 days and fined $10,000 by the New York State Gaming Commission.
abstract: Prominent horse trainer Doug O'Neill is suspended for 45 days and fined $10,000 by the New York State Gaming Commission after one of his horses tested positive for a banned substance following 2013 race at Belmont Park.
lead_paragraph: The trainer Doug O’Neill, who trained the 2012 Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner I’ll Have Another, was suspended 45 days and fined $10,000 by the New York State Gaming Commission.
